00024 #include <cmath>
00025 #include <limits>

00028 
00029 class observation
00030 {
00031 public:
00032   inline void set_default_values(void) { squared_c = std::numeric_limits<double>::max(); confidence = 1.; weight = 1.; sqrt_weight = 1.; ground_truth_outlier = false; }
00033   ls_minimizer_type squared_c_current, squared_c, c_min, c_max;
00034   ls_minimizer_type weight, sqrt_weight;
00035   double confidence;
00036   bool outlier, ground_truth_outlier;
00037 };
